Reviews.Title: Right size, right price, all around nice tablet
Reviews.Author: MacBob
Reviews.Content: This product competes with the Ipad Mini. Pros: Looks and feels well made, 5 mp rear camera takes good photos/videos, front camera is ok, good battery life, zippy performance both opening app's and using wifi to surf the internet, far less expensive than Ipad Mini, hdmi port to connect to tv, mini usb port. Cons: although screen resolution is good, not up to  new tablet hi definition standards, tablet a little chunky (thick).

ProductInfo.Features:
, 7.9 inches Display
A4 1.2 GHz
8 GB Flash Memory, 1 GB RAM Memory
0.9 pounds
ProductInfo.Name: Acer Iconia A1-810-L677 7.9 inch MediaTek MT8125 1.2GHz/ 1GB DDR3L/ 8GB SSD/ Android 4.2 Jelly Bean Tablet (Red)
